articles.content:

articles.author: Indrasish Ganguly
articles.title: WATCH: Esteban Ocon Pits in the McLaren Box Instead of Renault in Imola Free Practice - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Watch Esteban Ocon end up in McLaren pit while returning from Practice at Imola. It reminds you of Lewis Hamilton back in the year 2013.
articles.content: It happened again. One of the most embarrassing acts on the grid. Many great racers have fallen prey to this, and this time it was Esteban Ocon. The Frenchman was boxing after Practice 1 at Imola whe… [+2011 chars]

articles.author: Joe Rimmer
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp made Roberto Firmino decision that transformed Liverpool and left Jose Mourinho fuming - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Jurgen Klopp got his first Premier League win at Stamford Bridge to pile the pressure on a furious Jose Mourinho - and he gave Liverpool fans a first glimpse of a tactic that would define his team in the years to come
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp had been Liverpool manager for almost a month before he truly announced himself in the Premier League.
